text: House of Greed () is a 1933 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky.ИУДУШКА ГОЛОВЛЕВВерность It stars Vladimir Gardin, Tatyana Bulakh- Gardina, and Nina Latonina. == Actors == * Vladimir Gardin as Porfiriy Golovlyov * Tatyana Bulakh-Gardina as Annenka * Nina Latonina as Lyubinka * Yekaterina Korchagina-Aleksandrovskaya as Ulita * Mikhail Tarkhanov as Derunov * Irina Zarubina as Evprakseya * Vladimir Taskin as Petenka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1933 drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky Category:Soviet drama movies
title: House of Greed
